targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance="$instance",job="$job", mode="user"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance",job="$job"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: Guest - Time spent running a virtual CPU for a guest OS

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_guest_seconds_total{instance="$instance",job="$job", mode="nice"}[1m])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="$instance",job="$job"}[1m])))
targets.legendFormat: Guest Nice - Time spent running a niced guest (virtual CPU for guest OS)

matcher.options: Idle - Waiting for something to happen
Iowait - Waiting for I/O to complete
Nice - Niced processes executing in user mode
Steal - Time spent in other operating systems when running in a virtualized environment
System - Processes executing in kernel mode
User - Normal processes executing in user mode

Dirty - Waiting to get written back to the disk
